MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH16 and EH8postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Lutton Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:46pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:50pm on Tuesday the 27th April 2021
